title: Resentment Inventory
description: Work through resentments using the Fourth Step inventory format

fields.label: I am resentful at (person, institution, or principle)
fields.help: Who or what are you resentful toward?

fields.label: The Cause - What happened?
fields.help: Describe the situation that caused this resentment

fields.label: Does this affect my security (financial, emotional, physical)?
Does this affect my ambitions or goals?
What was my part? (selfishness, dishonesty, fear, etc.)
fields.help: Look at your own behavior, attitudes, and actions in this situation

fields.label: Am I willing to pray for this person?
What action can I take to let go of this resentment?
fields.help: Talk to sponsor, make amends, pray, accept what I cannot change, etc.
